Home.heroVerse1: Truly, truly, I say to you, Unless the grain of wheat falls into the ground and dies,
Home.heroVerse2: it abides alone; but if it dies, it bears much fruit.
Home.home01title1: WE LOVE CHRIST. WE LOVE HIS PEOPLE.
Home.home01p1: We believe in the Lord Jesus Christ, whom we have received personally as our Savior.
Home.home01p2: He is the most amazing and loveable person.
Home.home01p3: We love Him and endeavor to give Him the first place in all things.
Home.home01p4: Rejoice in being washed by His blood, partaking on the divine nature, be filled with the Holy Spirit and be led to the fellowship of His Body!
Home.home02p1: The Church in Prague is not our name - it is a description. We simply meet as believers in this city and receive as our brothers and sisters all those who believe in the Lord Jesus. We similarly gladly receive guests and visitors who are not Christians yet.
Home.home02p2: We hold the faith, which is common to all believers
Home.home02p4: The Bible is the complete divine revelation inspired by God through the Holy Spirit.
Home.home02p6: God is only one and yet a Trinity - Father, Son and Spirit
Home.home02p8: The Son of God, even God Himself was incarnated to become a man by the name of Jesus Christ
Home.home02p10: Christ died on the cross for our sins, shed His blood for our redemption
Home.home02p12: Christ rose from the dead on the third day
Home.home02p14: Christ ascended to the right hand of God to be the Lord of all
Home.home02p16: Whenever someone repents before God and believes in the Lord Jesus Christ, that one is regenerated and becomes a living member of the Body of Chrit
Home.home02p18: Christ is coming back to receive His believers to Himself
Home.cookiesText: This site does not collect any information.
Home.blogMore: For more of similar content go to rhemabooks.org

Home.contactInvite01: For personal contact or Bible study
Home.contactInvite02: contact us via contact form please.
Home.contactInvite03: In him was life, and that life was the light of all mankind.
Home.gdpr1: We do not store the data provided by you in any database.
Home.gdpr2: The email will only be used to respond to your message.
